personalInfo.name: Kapil
personalInfo.myDescription: Still fascinated by technology and amazed on it's impact on everyone

responsabilities: Designed and implemented REST interface and updated clients for a legacy RMI server
Help triage and fix multiple bugs to increase stability and accuracy of Build and Test system at Mathworks
Designed GoLang tooling for mass transition of Perforce depots to Git SCM system; while ensuring the backend components are configured correctly
Worked on multiple enhacements to provide new features for job scheduler DAG
Responsible for designing test-plans and automated tests for Mathworks continuous build and integration system‚Äôs development and workflows.
Collaborating with cross functional teams to improve processes and helping debug system issues, working for core infrastructure of building, testing, and releasing of all MathWorks products.
Developing scripts, tools and processes to create and maintain test environments for multiple components.
Mentoring junior engineers to help transition into team and train them on component responsibilities and tasks.

Was primarily responsible to dynamically generate new graphs and charts; using javascript libraries; to help researchers and analysts to quickly visualize patterns and spot outliers in collected data.
Designed templates for new type of charts providing greater interactivity and flexibility with an ability to generate reports.
Extensively used D3.js and require.js to render data and load modules in necessary order.
Proactively identified areas where efficiencies could be introduced and took initiative to automate manual tasks, using TIBCO BW automations and various VBScripts.
Increased team‚Äôs efficiency, preventing scope for inaccuracies by restructuring and optimized way of getting jobs done. Was recognized and awarded from the employer company regarding the same.
Achieved 'Rising Star Award' at Accenture Stellar Awards - 2013 (Q2).
Responsibilities included interacting with clients, framing SQL queries for CRM database maintenance tasks.
